00019 class mthModelBase { 
00020  public: 
00021   mthModelBase(DataPool *dataPool); 
00022   virtual ~mthModelBase(); 
00023   
00024         // --- register data from mDataPool ---
00025   virtual void registerData() {};       
00026 
00027         // --- initialize the simulation ---
00028   virtual void initialize() {};                         
00029         
00030         // --- calculate the properties at the start of each time step ---
00031   virtual void calcInitProps() {};      
00032         
00033         // --- calculate the properties at each Newton iteration ---
00034   virtual void calcProps() {};                                                          
00035 
00036         // --- linearize the nonlinear equation set (calculate Jacobian and RHS terms) ---
00037   virtual void linearize(double dt) {};
00038 
00039         // --- update for Newton-Raphson iteration ---
00040   virtual bool newtonUpdate() { return true; };
00041   
00042         // --- getters ---
00043   mthModelInfo getModelInfo() const { return mInfo; } 
00044   
00045         // --- output the model information ---
00046   friend ostream &operator <<(ostream &os, mthModelBase &model);
00047 
00048  
00049         //define the friend class
00050         friend class mthFlowEqnConnImp;
00051         friend class mthFlowEqnDiffImp;
00052 
00053 
00054  protected:
00055         mthModelInfo mInfo;                     // model information (type, imp, order)
00056         DataPool* mDataPool;            // pointer to datapool
00057   
00058         int nCells, nConns, nPhases, nComps, nHCPhases, nHCComps;
00059 
00060         // --- set model information (mInfo) ---
00061   void setModelInfo(mthModelType, mthModelIMP, mthModelOrder);
